ModMetaData.name: VGP Xtra Trees and Flowers
ModMetaData.author: dismarzero
ModMetaData.description:
Xtra Trees and Flowers (Does not require Vegetable Garden)
Adds EVEN MORE flowers and trees! From the Xtra Plants mod from Igabod long ago! Art work from the great Spoonshortage.
Adds New Flowers: -allium giganteum -anthurium -NymphHair -PinkRimstalk -Plumeria -Sunflower
Adds new Trees: -japanese maple -cherry blossom -camellia -acacia
